dev_env_delegation.critical_principle: ORCHESTRATORS COORDINATE, DON'T FIX ENVIRONMENT ISSUES
dev_env_delegation.overview: Complete environment issue delegation pattern for orchestrators defined in: ../../sdlc/shared/orchestrator-delegation-patterns.md (Environment Issues Delegation section)
dev_env_delegation.includes: - Critical principle (orchestrators coordinate, don't fix env) - Environment issue indicators (15+ error types) - Delegation workflow (3 steps with retry strategy) - Orchestration-specific scenarios (Atlassian MCP, env vars, git, mode coordination) - User communication templates - Retry approach after fixes
